statements: UPDATE RiskAssessmentData SET risk_score=0.85, entry_point=1200.50 WHERE company_name='ABC Corp';

UPDATE TradingStrategies SET parameters = '{"alpha": 0.05, "beta": 0.95}', description = 'Updated strategy parameters' WHERE strategy_name = 'Moving Average Crossover';

UPDATE NeuralNetworkModels SET layers = 5, activation_function = 'ReLU' WHERE model_id = 3;
